Lease extension documents for (CUSTOMER NAME)
PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL
To whom it may concern,
Please find the customer’s lease extension document attached. Please note that the password to open the file is your 4-digit dealer code.
Please note:
- Signed extension documents must be faxed or emailed back to Honda Canada Finance Inc. within 10 business days - No amendments or written notes will be accepted on the documents, except for an address change - Provide customer(s) signature(s) only (dealer does not sign the agreement) - For business lease extensions the “Name and Title of Authorized Signatory” section must be completed - The customer is responsible for all extended lease payments - Any delay in receiving the signed extension documents may negatively impact the customer's credit
Sincerely,
Renewal & Maturity Centre Honda Financial Services T: 1-800-387-5399 x7528 | F: 1-888-254-8875 Monday - Friday 8am-8pm EST crc@ch.honda.com
Please visit our owners' website at www.myhonda.ca or www.myacura.ca, click on “MyFinance” to register and access your account online. __________________________
This transmission (including attachments, if any) is confidential and may be privileged. It is intended only for the person(s) named above. Any other distribution, copying or disclosure whatsoever is STRICTLY PROHIBITED. If you have received this e-mail in error, please delete it and any attachments from your computer system and records.
